name: Delivery Game (mariusmopar)
description:
A short time challenge game about being a delivery driver. 

I wanted to practise creating a game in its entirety, so it is my first project that is a full (although short) game. There might still be a few bugs in there do let me know if you find anything!

Controls:

WASD for walking

E for interacting with doors and entering the vehicle

F for pushing the van if it gets stuck 

ESC for options menu

M for changing the radio channel in the van

The Skybox was made by Yuki2022: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/free-stylized-sk...

The music was made by Matt James: https://open.spotify.com/artist/4AwlBg7WJgrVpAKzskAOP7?si=BC5FVHzpR4KLt0QPkqNRvQ
